mapper.select: select b.tnsda_context_model_cmid, b.tnsda_context_info_ciid, c.cmname, a.ciname, a.conditions, a.domain, a.sparql, a.ci_remarks, c.cm_remarks, a.arg_cnt as ci_arg_cnt, c.arg_cnt as cm_arg_cnt from tnsda_context_info a, tnsda_context_model_info b, tnsda_context_model c where a.ciid=b.tnsda_context_info_ciid and b.use_yn='Y' and b.tnsda_context_model_cmid = c.cmid order by cmid desc

select b.tnsda_context_model_cmid, b.tnsda_context_info_ciid, c.cmname, a.ciname, a.conditions, a.domain, a.sparql, a.ci_remarks, c.cm_remarks, a.arg_cnt as ci_arg_cnt, c.arg_cnt as cm_arg_cnt from tnsda_context_info a, tnsda_context_model_info b, tnsda_context_model c where a.use_yn = 'Y' and b.use_yn = 'Y' and c.use_yn = 'Y' and a.ciid=b.tnsda_context_info_ciid and b.tnsda_context_model_cmid=#{cmid} and b.tnsda_context_model_cmid = c.cmid order by cmid desc

select b.tnsda_context_model_cmid, b.tnsda_context_info_ciid, a.ciname, a.conditions, a.domain, a.sparql, a.arg_cnt as ci_arg_cnt, c.arg_cnt as cm_arg_cnt, c.cmname from tnsda_context_info a, tnsda_context_model_info b, tnsda_context_model c where a.use_yn = 'Y' and b.use_yn = 'Y' and c.use_yn = 'Y' and a.ciid=b.tnsda_context_info_ciid and b.tnsda_context_model_cmid=c.cmid and b.tnsda_context_model_cmid=#{cmid}
